title: Who are some really good unknown rappers? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are two up and coming rappers that I’ve been listening to recently. Iann Dior - A lot like Juice WRLD. He raps mostly about heartbreak and girls, but also referenced some drugs. He is known as a emo rapper.Poorstacy - He is a lot like Iann Dior and Juice WLRD, mostly rapping about heartbreak and drugs,Both rappers are worth listening to.

Justin Starling is one of the best underrated lyricist in the game right now, his punchlines always come strong and his ability to make new songs constantly, (last year he made one every week woah!) makes him one of the best imo. Here’s some songs by him I’d check out if I were you.
